sections.heading: in evidence.In a proceeding, evidence of a record or signature may not be excluded solely because it is in electronic form

sections.text:
86-640.Admissibility in evidence.

In a proceeding, evidence of a record or signature may not be excluded solely because it is in electronic form.

SourceLaws 2000, LB 929, § 13;R.S.Supp.,2000, § 86-2113;Laws 2002, LB 1105, § 402.
